website_summaries.verdict: An excellent, affordable choice for draw and fire exercises.
pros: Made from a quality steel and the gun has a good weight to it
The look and feel accurately resemble a real gun
Produces straight and accurate shots with great power
Speed: 0.177 bb at 325 feet per second
cons: Shots are quite loud, can be startling

customer_reviews.title: Another malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with the first pistol upon opening, it didn’t transfer gas from magazine to B.B.. Amazon customer service sent me a replacement. Work great for about 550-600 shots. Then the magazine valve (nipped part) protruded further out for some reason. Now the magazine cannot be inserted or pulled out of the handle without releasing some gas due to the protruding nipple on valve scrapping the inside of handle. Another magazine is around $30. Not worth the initial cost and then have to buy extra magazine. Don’t know if extra magazine will malfunction also. Came out to be an expensive 550-600 shots.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Guinn

customer_reviews.title: Good training pistol.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a toy, it looks and almost feels and weighs like the real one it weighs a little less but honestly not much difference it does not come with an orange cap, it can be mistaken as a real gun the barrel size does not look much different than a .22 (dont ever look down the barrel even if you know its not loaded) if you're buying this for your kid it would be a good start in teaching them safty rules and laws when handling a gun, i strongly recommend parent supervision with this.
customer_reviews.author: Plutonium

customer_reviews.title: Magazine gas leak, buyers beware
customer_reviews.text: after 2 gas changes, the 3rd and any subsequent magazines started leaking and nothing fixed it, from using 100% silicone lubricant to tightening/loosening anything in it. I'd give it a 0/5 if I could. $100 piece of **** save yourself money and buy something without magazine leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Shayan

customer_reviews.title: so ot has excellent value as a trainer
customer_reviews.text: This is a faithful 1911 replica and amazingly well made. Other than the dramatic difference in recoil between this handgun and the real thing, it's hard to distinguish, so ot has excellent value as a trainer. It was very satisfying drawing from a holster when cocked & locked, disengaging the realistic safety during the push out, and doing emergency/tactical reloads. Now, it won't help with training on a quick follow up shot, because of the unrealistic recoil force, but because it is milder, it can conceivably help to train someone out of their habitual flinch. This gun shoots well, is fairly accurate, and way cheaper to run... and so much fun emptying the magazine as quick as you can!
customer_reviews.author: dayoldy

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome CO2 pistol!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe the feel, heft, and quality of this pistol when it arrived! I have several 1911's, so have a decent basis for comparison. Steel construction, and VERY authentic feel for a 1911. Bought primarily for a legal carry option for a Halloween costume. Added some faux stag grips and it's a dang near perfect representation of Walt Longmire's service 1911. I've had a LOT of fun with it in the couple of days since I received it. Might have to buy another just for fun. =)
customer_reviews.author: E. James

customer_reviews.title: If it leaks, read this.
customer_reviews.text: Worked just fine, then the seals gave out. I found out, however, if you take a bit of thread tape and line it on the threads of the gas inlet, (where the CO2 cartridge is punctured), and the gas release spot (where the hammer hits to release the CO2), you can reduce the gas lost by quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas D.

customer_reviews.title: Great 1911 replica,can't go wrong if you get a good one.
customer_reviews.text: Great 1911 replica,you can get about 3 mags through the gun which is not the best but not bad either.Heavy recoil because of the blowback,I'd say it's close to 22lr pistol or maybe a 9mm recoil impulse.Has great white dot sights,the grips are interchangeable with real 1911 grips which is way cool.When loading the C02 be careful you have to put the C02 in just so,it has to be fully in the C02 slot in the mag because if it's a little off you can not insert the mag and you will waste a C02 because you have to unloosing the co2 screw which will empty the C02 cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: jim v

customer_reviews.title: Excellent co2 blowback pistol, very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This pistol is a lot of fun, great for practice and teaching people how to operate semi automatic pistols safely. It functions just like the real thing, locking the slide back after the last bb is fired from the magazine. Hit the mag release, magazine drops out and you pop a new one in ( the co2 cartridge is contained in the mag as well, so you get power back) drop the slide, and away you go again. It even field strips like the original! Have now put around 1500 rounds through it, still functioning perfectly. You'll want at least two extra magazines!
customer_reviews.author: Arslonga

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken, box opened and badly damaged
customer_reviews.text: When the gun arrived, the box was badly misshapen and the amazon tape was conpletely cut open and resealed with clear generic packing tape. The gun only fired about 5 shots after messing with it for a few hours, and the little piece attached to the hammer that strikes the cartridge pin was broken and gets lodged emptying the co2 on the first shot every time. Umarex has done great in the past and have a good history on their products, I believe mine is just defective. Hopefully the returns aren't unbearable
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Real feel
customer_reviews.text: Feels good and heavy, good action and everything I got it just to mess around the house with and set up little obstacles and stuff its super fun and is actually pretty loud sounds like a nail gun hahaha super sick. Sometimes if you load a BB itll come out and cause your gun to jam so just make sure when you load your magazine you make sure your bb's are in place and not coming out of the magazine. 9/10 buy tho <3
customer_reviews.author: Riley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great gun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it about two months ago. Very happy! The look, weight and action as of a real gun (including the blowback). Makes about 70-80 shots on one CO2 cartridge. Holds up to 19 BB's. Shoots rather accurately: from ~30 ft/10 m I can hit a target of about 4x4 in/10x10 cm. A BB will pass through several layers of cardboard (I use a big box packed with waist cardboard to catch the BB's for recycling).Initially disassembled and oiled before shooting. Oil it once in ~300 shots. For disassembling and assembling the gun see one of the reviews -- very helpful. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Ostrovski

customer_reviews.title: Molde Homestead
customer_reviews.text: I got my purchase a while back. I have to say it is a good quality material gun & it is holding up! It shoots very well, I'm very happy with the purchase. The pistol looks like a real gun, I am a happy customer wake my Colt Commander! Good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Johney D. Deaton

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I got to say like anything that you're loading a little BB's in the magazine, it's a little tedious. But the kids loved it. They could shoot off one two three four with no problem. Good gun for the money. Be careful what BB's you buy. I bought these BB's that were labeled 177 but they were actually too big and jammed in the gun.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Malerba

customer_reviews.title: 3rd party seller not responding
customer_reviews.text: First day after 3 reloads magazine start malfunctioning it leak all C02 thru the top all at ones, also the back sights are a little loose. I message the seller 3 times did not respond back its been almost 2 weeks still have not responded back not good for bussines i will not be buying another one from them disappointed because i do like the gun. Since 3rd party seller did not respond i have to file a A to z Claim thru Amazon will see what happens i will have to do another review to see what was the outcome still a pain on the rear more waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking Replica
customer_reviews.text: I really like the weight and feel of this Classic Replica.Looks and feels like a real 1911.Has thumb and grip Safety,Can field strip it down,Love the drop out mag that holds the CO2.Only issue is the front sight has a little wiggle in it.I contacted the company about it but haven’t heard back yet.Not a major issue but is reason I’m giving 4 instead of 5 stars.Grips can also be replaced if you wish.
customer_reviews.author: TimeLord

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly useful BB gun. I bought it with the plan of using it to teach my son's how to use a semi auto handgun with it's realism and it did not disappoint. After working with this I can now confidently know my family can handle a handgun safely.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyV.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite, great accuracy, beautiful appearance & functionality.. Lots of fun too! Vid is casual off-hand at 15ft..
customer_reviews.author: RJGould

customer_reviews.title: Seal on original magazine failed after 3 years. This ...
customer_reviews.text: Seal on original magazine failed after 3 years. This is identical to the original, so no problems with fit or performance. Only giving 4 stars due to high cost (bought the pistol for 69 bucks; replacement mag costs half that much w/ shipping!)
customer_reviews.author: RVee

customer_reviews.title: Great gun but a small issue
customer_reviews.text: Great gun had it for 3 years and shoots well my reason for a 3 star for money value is cause the entire frame and hammer is made of aluminum and over the years the hammer of this product started to break into pieces I have no problem with the mechanism or nothing but the hammer is no good would be better if it’s made of actual metal or something durable :( hope you guys can improve the materials Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Otto Von Bismarck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gun, poorly made valve in the mag.
customer_reviews.text: This gun is beautiful and I'm sure it's great to shoot... that is of course if you can load a co2 cannister into the mag without the co2 leaking. Maybe it's a mistake in this particular gun's production. I have no clue but I tried everything to fix it and gave up. I'm ordering a new mag to see if that one will work. I was very excited for this gun but then quickly disappointed in the mag.
customer_reviews.author: Daren R.

customer_reviews.title: Just like the real thing.  Shoots accurately
customer_reviews.text: This feels just like the real thing! My husband bought it for target practice in our backyard, since we have 3/4 acre. We have get together s with our friends, at least once a month, and they enjoy shooting it. My husband keeps it on his workbench in garage and when people see it, they think it's the real deal. We've had 2 people say, after shooting ours, they want their own.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware
customer_reviews.text: Magazine was defective, neither amazon or seller gave me an answer. This product is too expensive to not get any type of warranty. I tried to return it and its impossible too. 115 dollars lost. Worst buy ever, terrible experience, horrible customer service. Nobody says anything, so now I have a gun and no magazine. THE ABSOLUTELY WORST EVER.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and top quality customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutley fantastic customer service they have won me over simply with the quick way that they responded how they were able to resolve the issue and the gun itself is absolutely fantastic. The gun itself is a wonderful piece of work I have a minor hiccup that I won't even mention because they were so quick to give me help and assistance it's not even an issue. I would honestly recommend this to anybody looking to purchase
customer_reviews.author: The Jersey Devil

customer_reviews.title: Pistol works just fine. I may require a bit of a tune- up real soon though...😬😬😬😂😂😂
customer_reviews.text: Turns out it was my brain that was defective...🤪🤪🤪😁😁😁...The pistol works fine. Please disregard my 'whine and cheese' rant earlier...🙂🙂🙂 Respectfully, John J Ward II John J Ward
customer_reviews.author: John J. Ward II

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Airgun Depot
customer_reviews.text: This pistol is great. I compared it to my dad's actually .45 and it looks and feels the same. If you want to target shoot, control pests or just have it for self defense, it's a good buy. Might even buy an extra magazine on my next pay check.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Saechao

customer_reviews.title: A great KWC gun
customer_reviews.text: This is obliviously a KWC gun, so the magazines for this, for the Tangofolio Witness, the Remington 1911 RACC, the Black Ops 1911, and the Swiss Air 1911 are all the same, and are interchangeable. This has the different style hammer than the others, but still the same pistol. I got mine as a refurb and was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: DO NO BUY. TERRIBLE PRODUCT.  Does not work at all. Manufacturer will not take back.
customer_reviews.text: Tried 3 CO2 cartridges, no gas to pistol. Cleaned openings, tried again, no luck. Tried to return to manufacturer, they said could not take back as sold thru Amazon. DO NOT BUY, I AS WELL AS OTHERS HAVE SAME PROBLEM.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: quick delivery, good product.
customer_reviews.text: Magazines arrived on time, and in good order. I've had the opportunity to put quite a few rounds downrange through both of them, and all is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Arslonga

customer_reviews.title: Great Product; Works and Handles Like a Real 1911 A1
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Works very well and will group under 3 inches at 25 feet fired off hand. Takes down like a real Colt 1911 A1. A great training tool. The Streamlight TLR-6 Laser sight fits this model perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: james hutchisson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and quite accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and quite accurate. It does consume the gas capsules quite a bit but for a semi-auto that is expected I think. Good and fun little item and leathal enough to get rit of pigeons/rabbits.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Denis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Feels real. Good blowback. Easy to take apart. Dont be stupid and brandish it for fun. It is 99% as real looking.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Zan

customer_reviews.title: ... could give this thing 5 stars because it is pretty awesome. It's heavy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this thing 5 stars because it is pretty awesome. It's heavy. It feels like a 9mm pistol. I have a beretta that is lighter than this BB gun. I bought this to shoot the birds that have been pestering my garden. And yes, it works. I've taken down a couple. It really does feel awesome in the hand. The only problem with with the load action. Once in awhile a Bb will drop out and fall to the ground. This is usually after you load the mag. All in all. I would buy it again. All day. It's dope for BB gun. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Brenan Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great air bb pistol
customer_reviews.text: One of my best 1911 air pistol. It is feels very real. All metal parts.
customer_reviews.author: triway

customer_reviews.title: Size and Weight of a Genuine Colt 1911.
customer_reviews.text: Great air gun. Same size and weight as a real 1911. Even disassembles like one. Accurate, with nice adjustable sights. I bought a .22 target trap and we have had fun competitions shooting in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: fun gun
customer_reviews.text: looks like the real Colt.nice weight and blowback action adds to realism. shot three mags using one co2 cylinder. also, disassembles ALMOST like the real gun.No link pin to worry about
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I'm super surprised how real it looks and feel
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. I'm super surprised how real it looks and feel. **** For yours and others safety, do not carry this out where others may mistaken it for a real gun! ****
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: which is good as it gives me the real gun feeling
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a practice gun, it's a fully simulated 1911 gun, almost all metal and very heavy, which is good as it gives me the real gun feeling. The only complain would be gas usage. It only gave me 3.5 full cartridge shooting for each CO2 replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tao Yang

customer_reviews.title: No service available for co2 pistol.
customer_reviews.text: Have not shot pistol one time. Had an issue with a screw that tightens the co2 cartridge. Amazon websites asked me to contact Umarex first, so I did. They told me that they do NOT service the Colt Commander and that they receive calls all the time regarding repairs on the Colf but shouldn't and that I should call Colt. I did. They said to call Umarex cause they service them. NO help so it's going back!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Amazing build quality.
customer_reviews.text: This gun is amazing. As a security officer I carry a glock 19 for work and I really wanted to tech my son about gun safety without having to use the real thing. This is the perfect training tool. The build quality is amazing and I am highly impressed on the detail.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks real, feels real
customer_reviews.text: Looks legit. Feels legit. Has a decent “fake” kickback. Pain in the butt to load the BBs, though. Be careful. They can pop out and put an eye out if not loaded properly. My boyfriend has fun shooting it.
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: slide action/lockup feels and sounds great, unexpectedly realistic
customer_reviews.text: Extremely solidly built replica. Hammer is quite heavy and has no play, trigger is crisp, slide action/lockup feels and sounds great, unexpectedly realistic. Releasing the slide gives a genuine metallic sound, as with a real firearm. The finish is just fine, but the nickel barrel really sold it for me. Weight is pretty close to the real deal as well. I would get rid of the warning writing on the right side of the gun, sort of takes away from an otherwise excellent replica of a 1911 handgun.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzz Ball

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. As for durability with proper care, I'll keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Jess  McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this one to replace a defective clip that game with the gun. Works fine with zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Issac Starrett

customer_reviews.title: ... a shot myself and I can truly say I LOVE IT. Functions and feels just like a real ...
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews on this and decided to give it a shot myself and I can truly say I LOVE IT. Functions and feels just like a real 1911. Great for practicing close quarter shooting,7-10 yards, on multiple targets. Great trigger action on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked only for 4 months bummer.
customer_reviews.text: Possible design problem. Had this Mag for 4 months. I also only use manufacturer CO2 type per owners manual. But today put in CO2 and it dispensed out the top of the Mag will not hold C02 unfortunately anymore. I don't think this is the seller's fault I think it's more of a manufacturer defect.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful replica
customer_reviews.text: Super good looking gun, operates nicely, sucks that it doesn’t come with a rail but I’ll deal (you can actually replace the grips with ReCover rail grips, but it takes some extra work to get them to fit) overall, can’t wait to put them to use when fields are open again
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Love the blow back action. Looks and feels just like a real 1911. All metal except the grips. Wish it came in a box and not a blister pack.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better magazine
customer_reviews.text: I liked the weight and feel of the pistol but the first time I actually loaded it and tried to fire it emptied the mag in 4 seconds, and every time I try to put co2 in it empties as soon as the cartridge is pierced.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H.

customer_reviews.title: Colt commander
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. A little heavy. Seems to be very well made. Full metal mag....that’s always a plus. Comes with a large Allen key for the CO2.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Soltis

customer_reviews.title: it feels amazing to shoot and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and used it once and was very impressed by it, it feels amazing to shoot and is easy to use, it does use up co2 quickly but it's worth it. It feels so real and looks and feels even better then the pictures do, I'm excited to keep using it and I hope it doesn't break quickly because I really like it, buy it and you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look and authentic feel!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of my favorite m1911 replicas! Although for some reason every so often the slide will lock back when there are still rounds left in the mag. Not sure if it is the gun or the magazine... any info would be greatly appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Covert

customer_reviews.title: Great until it broke
customer_reviews.text: The air handler on the slide broke away from the slide itself causing feeding problems. Additionally attempted to affix front and rear sights with loctite 242 blue- without success. That said, the first 2000 rounds were fine. Recommend heavy use of the pistol within the warranty period in order to work out all the kinks. After talking to customer service, I have returned to manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Scott O

customer_reviews.title: great airgun
customer_reviews.text: i have several air pistols and this is my favorite one so close to the real colt 1911 in all details
customer_reviews.author: edgard

customer_reviews.title: Revised review.
customer_reviews.text: First one was defective. Umarex sent me a new one that is beautiful. Works very well. Thanks, guys! I gotta say this one is much nicer! Great looking. Feels good. Shoots straight. Nice trigger. Ran four loads on one cartridge. Pleased with the pistol and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Issue with magazine. Sent an email about a defective magazine weeks ago and haven’t heard back at all. Every time we put in the CO2 it just sprays out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chizzle
customer_reviews.text: Great pellet gun. If you're looking to bye one. This is to me the best you'll get.
customer_reviews.author: Chizzle

customer_reviews.title: 1911 is a clasic, sexy gun. Colt kills it with the real modle and this is an amazing replica.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is kind of crappy. But oh my god. This is the best bb gun I've ever owned. I've had it for almost a year now and it works perfectly and looks beautiful. This seller is amazing aswell. My amo clip defected and they replaced it in 2 days. If your looking for a really nice and afordably priced bb gun that looks and feels just like the real deal then you have to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice backyard shooter!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent weight! Great blowback! Very realistic! The fixed sites are outstanding! Nice 'pop' when fired!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Gun
customer_reviews.text: Great gun. I own a few and this one is fun! Very realistic. I actually treat it with respect and take good care of it. A must have....
customer_reviews.author: Darrin

customer_reviews.title: Love this gun
customer_reviews.text: Love this gun so realistic in weight and blow back. If anyone is interested in buying there first gun this is the gun you should get. Love it, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: PAID A LIL OVER $100.00 DOLLARS FOR IT.USED IT TWICE AND NOW THE CO 2 LEAKS OUT.WATCHED A VIDEO AND TRIED PUTTING TAPE ON TOP OF CARTRIDGE.IT IS A PIECE OF JUNK.WORSE BB PISTOL I HAVE PURCHASED BY FAR.PAPER WEIGHT PIECE OF METAL.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Francis

customer_reviews.title: extreme recommended
customer_reviews.text: perfect protection box , on time even faster i expected. extreme recommended
customer_reviews.author: morteza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. A lot of fun for targets and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. A lot of fun for targets and plunking. Good heft but quite a bit lighter than my stainless 1911. Very happy. Excellent training tool. Will buy more as gifts. Tons of fun! A few days late arriving but we had a nasty blizzard lol so no worries and nobodies fault.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great.value. Quality. And funtastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice piece! Great gift for anyone! Handle with care, that’s all. Aton of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Los

customer_reviews.title: As close to the real thing as it gets
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic item. Very realistic. It fits perfectly in a leather holster meant for a real handgun.
customer_reviews.author: Bob says

customer_reviews.title: Co2 screw arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Got the package today and opened it up and loved it. Went to put the co2 in and it wouldn't screw back in. Screw to secure c02 was broken and now I cant use it. Would like another one but idk how to contact seller. Will write a better review with a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it's advertised to
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it's advertised to! Mine came from Pyramyd Air via Amazon.Pyramyd shippers really know how to package for a rough ride.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't recommend another bb gun besides this
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than I thought , as described, wouldn't recommend another bb gun besides this. Uses more co2 than a non blowback but IT IS WORTH IT.!!

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Great find, great buy!! Well made and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: CJ56

customer_reviews.title: Good small animal defense
customer_reviews.text: Used it to defend my trash cans from Raccoons. Have not seen them back yet :)
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Yang

customer_reviews.title: Reassemble the gun
customer_reviews.text: When reassembling the gun the spring with more coils goes in first
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy P.

customer_reviews.title: Apparently no quality control at Umarex.
customer_reviews.text: Defective right out of the box. Among other problems, the safety can't engage. Piece of useless junk.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised with the way in the accuracy of ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised with the way in the accuracy of this air pistol, I was using it to help me train or USPSA pistol shooting competition. The CO2 cartridge did not last very long that was the only drawback there was.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's great. It has every safety feature that is on ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great. It has every safety feature that is on the real military, including the grip safety. It will not fire if the grip is not squeezed. It only has one negative. Because of the blow back it uses a lot of Co2.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: its a pretty good gun except the mags
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it but the only problems are the magazines they jam sometimes and they have leaks of co2.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Love the gun
customer_reviews.text: Love the gun. It is fun to shoot and having a 45 cal 1911 I was pleasantly surprised on how close it felt to the 1911 in my hand. Great gun to practice all the basic handling of the 1911 (loading magazine, bring up and getting on target, increasing speed of fire without giving up accuracy, etc.) with out the cost of 45 ammo. I have put about 500 BB rounds through it so far and it has not failed to load or fire (until out of CO2) and I get about 55 shots per CO2 cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: William Nickum

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it , great product, sorry for the delay reviews, I was just having a great time, with my new colt commander, , will order more from this site
customer_reviews.author: HARLEY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome Air Gun. Looks and feels very real!
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun. I use to practice
customer_reviews.text: I have become more proficient shooter with this gun. Easy to use easy to strip down and very realistic. My police officer friend even likes to play with it shooting targets in the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn & Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is second gun works great no leakage in magazine. Great fun to shoot and strong blowback.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie C Cain

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Purchase.. So Nice.. I couldn't have purchased and been so pleased as I am now..
customer_reviews.author: c dub u

customer_reviews.title: treat with care
customer_reviews.text: it jammed and broke after a few weeks still cool to play with

customer_reviews.title: CO2 runs out really fast

customer_reviews.text: One of the best in the market. Great accuracy. Feels solid just like the real colt.

customer_reviews.title: A faithful reproduction of the legendary classic!
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy lets you experience the thrill of one the world's most popular, most effective handguns without the hassle of licensure, paying for range time or spending a bundle on ammo. It is now by far my favorite blowback! Good stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: MVO

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had my gun for 3 days as of now. I have shot it approximately 100 times with no problems at all. This gun looks and feels like a real 1911. THROUGHLY IMPRESSED!!! I dont think you'll be disappointed! I will update in a couple months so stay tuned....

customer_reviews.author: Stephen R.

customer_reviews.title: Best pistol on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality pistol. Very heavy and realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan ladd

customer_reviews.title: Great replica BB gun
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent replica BB gun. I'm disabled and can't get out and shoot as I used to so I shoot indoors with airguns. This is a smooth bo5re BB gun but at 10 to 15 feet it pretty much keeps the rounds within a quarter sized group (aside from the occasional flyer which you always seem to get). I shoot mostly blowback BB guns now as they feel more like a firearm. This is one of my 2 favorites and the other has developed a problem. This is one great BB gun.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Functions like a real fire arm.  Great for practice
customer_reviews.text: Love the blowback. Looks and feels like a true Colt 45

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun, authentic 1911 replica. Works well, for a good price.

customer_reviews.title: Great for young and old alike
customer_reviews.text: Great BB gun. I got it for my 10 year old, he loves it. It functions and handles like a 1911 in every way. It would even make a great indoor trainer for an adult that uses a 1911.

customer_reviews.text: This bb gun is the bomb. It was worth every penny, but be careful bringing this thing out in public looks like the real deal.

customer_reviews.title: Barrel Jams
customer_reviews.text: Gun Worked for about 1 or 2 weeks and now the gun has frequent jams where the BB's get stuck in the barrel and i have to dig them out

customer_reviews.text: bought for my hubby. He loves it so much. Has the weight of a real gun and its all metal.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin C.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy. Broke on the third co2 cartridge
customer_reviews.text: Not a good buy. Broke on the third co2 cartridge
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gun --- Easy loading tip---.
customer_reviews.text: Great gun for training. I have a real Colt 1911 that I couldn't hit anything with. Shooting a couple of hundred "rounds" with this gun improved my range score a bunch. A lot of reviews I read say it is to hard to load. This is true if you follow the directions. My method is to hold the mag spring all the way down with my finger nail and pour the BBs into the little square hole at the bottom of the mag. Hold it on an angle over a plastic bowl to catch the extras. Nothing to it except the broken finger nail. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: swany

product_meta.title: Umarex Colt Commander Blowback Metal Frame .177 BB
feature_bullets: Look and feel of the original with the functional reliability of a solid BB gun; Realistic blowback action
Shoots .177 caliber steel BBs at up to 300 fps
Powered by economical and easy-to-find 12-gram CO2 cartridges; CO2 cartridge housed in the grip
Features adjustable tactical sights, commander style hammer, and an authentic manual grip safety
